channel.title: Comments on: World of Warcraft Bot

item.title: By: Darren
item.dc:creator: Darren
item.content:encoded:
I am going to be getting a fresh account to bot on tomorrow. I thought that it would be fun to start a blog with daily screen shots and detailed reports.

I am taking suggestions for race/class so if you have one just drop me a comment.

Check it out if you have a few minutes.

wowbotter.blogspot.com

Any suggestions, feedback, or constructive criticism is welcome.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I guess you could contact the people behind the <a href="http://warcraftbot.blogspot.com/" rel="nofollow">World of Warcraft bot </a>site and ask them how they do it.
Other than that, you'll have to do some googling and some research and some trial and error and then <em>maybe</em> you'd have something.
I'm going to be blunt with you here. I'm sensing a pattern in your behavior and that pattern is Sloth. Not only do you want a Warcraft bot, but you're unwilling to put much effort into getting one other than a short comment on an unfamiliar blog.
Of course I could be wrong and you're a regular that's had a few too many.
item.content:encoded:
I guess you could contact the people behind the World of Warcraft bot site and ask them how they do it.

Other than that, you’ll have to do some googling and some research and some trial and error and then maybe you’d have something.

I’m going to be blunt with you here. I’m sensing a pattern in your behavior and that pattern is Sloth. Not only do you want a Warcraft bot, but you’re unwilling to put much effort into getting one other than a short comment on an unfamiliar blog.

Of course I could be wrong and you’re a regular that’s had a few too many.

item.title: By: Adot
item.dc:creator: Adot
item.description: i really need it for my char its pretty bored ?
